name: ORDINAL HODL MEME
description: Holders of ORDINAL HODL tokens can earn yield by providing liquidity through staking into the liquidity pool. Additionally, ORDINAL HODL token holders have the flexibility to exchange either type of token for the other at a 1:1 ratio (BRC-20 to SOL and vice versa) in a bridge that will be implemented. The ultimate objective of the ORDINAL HODL token is to facilitate seamless swaps between SOL tokens across the Bitcoin-Solana bridge. Furthermore, ORDINAL HODL token holders can convert their tokens to native coins on the blockchain using a smart contract. Name: ORDINAL HODL Symbol: HODL Supply: 21M By enabling efficient cross-chain liquidity provision and token swaps, ORDINAL HODL plays a crucial role in fostering interoperability and expanding the possibilities for users in the Bitcoin, Solana, and blockchain ecosystems.
